p:
The Li-ion conductivity of CE53 at 20 °C amounts to 2.86 × 10 –4 S cm –1 and it is sufficient to operate the battery at RT at low current regimes.
3 Therefore, a freshly prepared cell was built and cycled at RT, without any conditioning. Figure 4 depicts the galvanostatic cycling with a potential limitation (GCPL) profile of the Li|CE53|TiS 2 cell, operating with a current density of 24 mA g –1 (C/10).
